I love this dress and I have a few in this design because it’s so flattering. I always get compliments from strangers when I wear it! I wash it in the machine but air dry it. The fabric is neither light nor heavy and is not see through. Super comfort. It will show your legs in the wind which I don’t mind, but you can easily wear it with matching leggings.

I bought this dress for a wedding and it was super cute! The dress was very wrinkly when it came but I think that's just inevitable when sending clothes through the mail. With a little steaming, the dress looked great! It was a good length and fit me great. I'm 5' 5" and 175 pounds and a size medium was perfect.

This is a very nice quality dress. I could have done Med. But large was fine fit perfect. The material is really good. I am -5’7, inch 185 and big on the breast area. But this is loose and it has room. Love it.

I love these dresses! I ordered the floral blue dress and wore it all the time — while not pregnant, pregnant, and when nursing. Its subtle front-close clasp is perfect for nursing mothers who don’t want to wear garments marketed as “nursing clothes.” I loved this dress so much that I bought the floral green dress as well. It is flirty enough to wear on a date with my husband and modest enough to be my go-to for family functions. Because it is polyester, it resists wrinkles when packed in a suitcase. I rarely write product reviews, but the comfort, versatility, and flattering style is amazing. I’d wear these every day if I could!
Fit great, did not wrinkle much very comfortable

评论概述: Not an actual wrap dress, it's a faux wrap
评论详情: This is titled as a wrap dress, but it's a faux wrap. Elastic waistline with loops for a belt tie. Unless your waist lines up exactly with the elastic, this isn't going to look good. I can only imagine how many pins and tucks were used for the models for this dress to make it look like an actual wrap dress. Will be returning.
This is now my favorite dress. Very flattering and well made. I have worn it to church and out to my special birthday dinner with family. Very pretty and feminine.

I really like this dress as it is flattering, easy to wear, and versatile. I was able to wear it to a bridal shower in March with a denim jacket and wedge heels but can also wear it with sandals for a more casual look. The green color is a nice neutral looking green and the fabric of the skirt flows well over the belly area in a way that is flattering. I also bought this in blue because I really liked the silhouette and flow of this dress.

I'm about 5'4" and about 160 lbs., a little busty, always looking for dresses to "flow" over my figure flaws, and as nice as this dress is, it just didn't do it for me.  Lovely dress, wish it had worked for me!

This dress exceeded my expectations. I have the black floral one. It fits beautifully and has great coverage up top. I’m a busty gal and I really appreciated the small clasp they added up top for more coverage. I more than fit in the top which is uncommon for me. I feel like I could have sized down even. It’s a perfect length. I love the addition of the belt tie. I’m planning to get this in more colors.

Absolutely love everything about this dress! It is pretty & lightweight material that is not see-through, yet easy to care for (washed well in machine + no ironing needed). Cute wrap style WITHOUT the inconvenience of the skirt flying open (during a gust of wind, or even just sitting down) I also love the snap on the neckline and the cute little ruffle "sleeves". I also really appreciate that it's on the longer side and doesn't show my ugly knees (I'm 5'7). The only thing I wish it had, was pockets - then it would be perfect! And I would buy more colors.

类型: Color: Floral Print Wine Red WhiteSize: X-Large
评论详情: Love the shape and drape of the dress. Fits well based on sizing chart. Only down fall is it was very prone to static and would stick to my legs after some walking. I'm a nursing mother anthe dress was stylish and still worked well for that purpose.
I almost sized up, but decided not to. Glad I didn’t… way longer than expected- I am kinda short. 5”2. Was loose fitting- made me feel like an old lady. Will be returning.
I liked the material the dress was made of and the way it fits

I love this dress. I ordered three and this is the one I’m keeping to host a bridal shower. I am 5 feet tall 125 pounds and fairly curvy.(translation, big bum big bust :) and the size small fit me perfectly. It has a snap at the chest, which I would’ve had to add had one not already been there. It’s a very flattering dress and seems to just flow over any flaws or extra pounds.  I found it very true to size. I usually wear a size 6. I love how the front comes up a little bit to give the hi-low look, although the fabric really overlaps, so you’re not at risk of any flashing in the wind. It is not lined, but it is not sheer at all, and because  there’s overlapping fabric I don’t think you  need to worry about a slip. I got the green. It’s a beautiful color. Other colors may be more sheer. I found  the  dress is much more beautiful on then in the pictures. Very happy.
Loved the material and color

This is a really cute dress.  I don't buy clothes online often, but I'm glad I bought this.  I am 5'8" and thin, so I ordered a Small and a Medium.  The small was too short-waisted, so I kept the medium.  The medium is a bit short-waisted too, but fits well enough that I am keeping it - it has a snap to keep the perfectly placed v-neck closed and, though it flows, it is thick enough not to be see-through.  The soft color green was exactly as pictured online.

It is a gorgeous dress! I had to fix the clip that holds the chest area together because the thread unstitched or came undone. But nothing some new thread and a needle couldn’t fix. The fabric is nice and easy to iron. Very flattering and baby bump friendly.
The dress is pretty but it is see through.

The dress is pretty, but it’s a much darker shade of green than what it looks like online. My biggest issue is that as soon as I opened the package it smelled extremely strongly of pot. I couldn’t ignore it and it actually gave me a headache. I’m going to return it because I’m not convinced that smell could even be washed out at this point, and the color is way different than what it appeared.
I love how modest this dress it Its beautiful!

I am not a small person, but this dress fits and lays just like the images. I am a size 10 in dresses usually and ordered a Large which is perfect. The stitching is smart along the bottom so the slit doesn't ride up in a revealing way at all - perfect for work/church/etc. There is a closure on the neckline but I can't figure out if it's operable or not, and it's plastic so I'm worried about breaking it. It seems like it is, and that would definitely make this dress breastfeeding friendly!

评论概述: Nice spring dress! True to color and description!

The floral pattern is cute, the color is true to the photo, I like the flutter sleeves. The only thing I slightly dislike is it’s not lined- I don’t think it’s see through?, and that it came super wrinkly. Overall good dress.
It’s not too sheer. Fits great! I bought two in different colors.
